message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product. It's a rare opportunity to own a unique item that will surely bring you great value. I'm willing to start the negotiation with a price of $12,000.
Alice, while I appreciate your enthusiasm, $12,000 is significantly above my budget. I'm interested in the product, but I can only offer $8,500 at this point. This is my best possible price.

I understand that $8,500 is your maximum budget, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to come down to $11,000, which is a significant concession from my initial offer. I believe this price still reflects the value of the product, and I'm confident you'll find it a fair deal.

Alice, I appreciate the compromise, but $11,000 is still beyond my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9,000, which is a significant increase from my previous offer.  I believe this price is fair considering the value we both see in the product.  I hope you'll consider it.

I can see you're serious about the product, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $9,000. I'm willing to compromise further and come down to $10,500. I believe this price still reflects the value of the product, and I'm confident you'll find it a fair deal.
Alice, we're getting closer. I can go up to $9,500. This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product and is within my budget. I'm confident we can close this deal at this price.

I can see you're getting closer to my target, Bob. I'm willing to make one more significant concession. I'm willing to meet you at $10,000, which is the lowest price I'm willing to accept. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product, and I'm eager to close the deal.
